item.title: What is your favorite movie? =]
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:12, topic:355555”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=452109.msg3314080#msg3314080 date=1282175537]

Avatar is an overrated movie.

You’re stupid, how is Avatar an overrated movie? It was good, the special effects were good, the script was good. It was just a good movie. All you ever do is come on to topics and bitch and say how you hate stuff, or to insult other people on the forums.

Why don’t you just go somewhere else, because you aren’t wanted or appreciated here.

Edit: Also, if it’s so overrated, why did it gross $2,740,405,721? on a budget of $237,000,000?
[/quote]I can tell by your anger that you’re an Avatar fanboy. Who cares how many people went to see it? Do you think Twilight movies are good because they earn well beyond their budget? That doesn’t make it a good movie.

The script was good? Rofl. Ever see Dances With Wolves, Fern Gully or Pocahontas?

So yes, Avatar is an overrated and trendy movie. [/quote]

I loved Avatar, obviously i saw Dances With Wolves and Pocahontas, i don’t know what Fern Gully is.

Twilight sucked, i never watched the sequels? The movie is about Aliens, i enjoyed the astronomy behind Avatar and how they introduced new species and new planets, and Pandora’s Gas giant beside it. I didn’t just care about how closely it is related to DWW and Pocahontas.

Read full topic
